{"id":961587022,"question_id":15,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 5 months","timestamp":1685617936,"status":14,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/961587022/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> threeSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n        \n        vector<vector<int>> ans;\n\n        for(int i=0; i<nums.size()-2; i++){\n            for(int j=i+1; j<nums.size()-1; j++){\n                for(int k=j+1; k<nums.size(); k++){\n                    if(nums[i] + nums[j] + nums[k] == 0){\n                        vector<int> n = {nums[i], nums[j], nums[k]};\n                        sort(n.begin(),n.end());\n\n                        if(find(ans.begin(), ans.end(), n)==ans.end()){\n                            ans.push_back(n);\n                        }\n                        \n                    }\n                }\n            }\n        }\n\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
